title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when modified.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not adjust accordingly.
EB: The label height should automatically adjust when the font size is modified, ensuring that the label content remains fully visible without any truncation or overflow.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.
2. Verify that the height of the label does not update to accommodate the new font size.
